answers.answer: That's one of the main signs of high blood pressure.  You should be seen by your doctor ASAP to make sure you don't have preeclampsia.  Sorry :(
Going 2 have my pressure tested now, thanks
Could also be to do with your sugars, but blood pressure/pre e would also bey first guess and concern. Good luck!

Well I had a normal pressure, blurred vision went away after half hour but left a very bad headache. I took 2 panadol pain killers and a sleep. Now I'm up feeling back to normal. Thanks for advice from you guys. My next doc appointment is on monday so I'll be sure 2 make mention of what had happened.

question: I'm 37 weeks pregnant n I now realize I'm havin blurred vision. Everythin g is so blurry.  Wat can this be????? Never had problems with my eyes b4 now.
title: blurred vision
